from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
from pyspark.sql.functions import explode, sequence, to_date

beginDate = '1981-01-01'
endDate = '2050-12-31'


(
  spark.sql(f"select explode(sequence(to_date('{beginDate}'), to_date('{endDate}'), interval 1 day)) as calendarDate")
    .createOrReplaceTempView('dates')

%%sql
select
  year(calendarDate) * 10000 + month(calendarDate) * 100 + day(calendarDate) as dateInt,
  CalendarDate,
  CalendarDate - day(calendarDate) + 1 AS FirstOfMonth,
  year(calendarDate) AS CalendarYear,
  date_format(calendarDate, 'MMMM') as CalendarMonth,
  month(calendarDate) as MonthOfYear,
  date_format(calendarDate, 'EEEE') as DayName,
  dayofweek(calendarDate) AS DayOfWeek,
  weekday(calendarDate) + 1 as DayOfWeekStartMonday,
  year(current_date)-year(calendarDate) AS AGE,
  case
    when weekday(calendarDate) < 5 then 'Y'
    else 'N'
  end as IsWeekDay,
  dayofmonth(calendarDate) as DayOfMonth,
  case
    when calendarDate = last_day(calendarDate) then 'Y'
    else 'N'
  end as IsLastDayOfMonth,
  dayofyear(calendarDate) as DayOfYear,
  weekofyear(calendarDate) as WeekOfYearIso,
  quarter(calendarDate) as QuarterOfYear,
  /* Use financial periods needed by organization financial calendar */
  case
    when month(calendarDate) < 4 then year(calendarDate) -1
    else year(calendarDate)
  end as FinancialYear,
  case
    when month(calendarDate) < 4 then year(calendarDate) 
    else year(calendarDate) +1
  end as NextFinancialYear,
  CASE
    when quarter(calendarDate) =1 then 4
    else quarter(calendarDate) -1
  END as FinancialQuarter
from
  dates
order by
  calendarDate

%%sql

  case
    when month(calendarDate) < 4 then year(calendarDate) -1

    when month(calendarDate) < 4 then year(calendarDate)

%%sql
create or replace table calendar_dim_plus
using delta
location '/odw_harmonised_db/calendar_dim_plus'
as select
  year(calendarDate) * 10000 + month(calendarDate) * 100 + day(calendarDate) as dateInt,
  CalendarDate,
  CalendarDate - day(calendarDate) + 1 AS FirstOfMonth,
  year(calendarDate) AS CalendarYear,
  date_format(calendarDate, 'MMMM') as CalendarMonth,
  month(calendarDate) as MonthOfYear,
  date_format(calendarDate, 'EEEE') as DayName,
  dayofweek(calendarDate) AS DayOfWeek,
  weekday(calendarDate) + 1 as DayOfWeekStartMonday,
  year(current_date)-year(calendarDate) AS AGE,
  case
    when weekday(calendarDate) < 5 then 'Y'
    else 'N'
  end as IsWeekDay,
  dayofmonth(calendarDate) as DayOfMonth,
  case
    when calendarDate = last_day(calendarDate) then 'Y'
    else 'N'
  end as IsLastDayOfMonth,
  dayofyear(calendarDate) as DayOfYear,
  weekofyear(calendarDate) as WeekOfYearIso,
  quarter(calendarDate) as QuarterOfYear,
  /* Use financial periods needed by organization financial calendar */
  case
    when month(calendarDate) < 4 then year(calendarDate) -1
    else year(calendarDate)
  end as FinancialYear,
  case
    when month(calendarDate) < 4 then year(calendarDate) 
    else year(calendarDate) +1
  end as NextFinancialYear,
  CASE
    when quarter(calendarDate) =1 then 4
    else quarter(calendarDate) -1
  END as FinancialQuarter,
  concat(FinancialYear,'-',NextFinancialYear) as FinancialPeriod,
  concat(MonthOfYear,'-',CalendarYear) AS MonthANDYear,
    CASE
    WHEN FinancialYear =  year(current_timestamp) and month(current_timestamp)>3 THEN 'Current FY'
    WHEN FinancialYear =  year(current_timestamp)-1 and month(current_timestamp)<4 THEN 'Current FY'  
    WHEN FinancialYear =  year(current_timestamp)-1 and month(current_timestamp)>3 THEN 'Previous FY'
    WHEN FinancialYear =  year(current_timestamp) and month(current_timestamp)<4 THEN 'Previous FY'
    WHEN FinancialYear =  year(current_timestamp)-1 and month(current_timestamp)<4 THEN 'Older FY'
    WHEN FinancialYear =  year(current_timestamp)-2 and month(current_timestamp)>3 THEN 'Older FY'   
    WHEN FinancialYear < year(current_timestamp)-2 THEN 'Older FY'
    ELSE 'Future FY'
  END AS financial_year,
  CASE
    WHEN CalendarYear = year(current_timestamp) then 'Current CY'
    WHEN CalendarYear = year(current_timestamp) - 1 then 'Previous CY'
    WHEN CalendarYear < year(current_timestamp) - 1 then 'Older CY'
    ELSE 'Future CY'
  END AS calendar_year
from
    calendar_dim
